en.explanation_content: Matrix operations are possible with operators. Multiply is $O(N^3)$, power is $O(\log N)$
en.reference_about: Type T is the internal type of the matrix.
en.constructor_normal_explanation: Generate a matrix with $H$ rows and $W$ columns
en.constructor_square_explanation: Generate a matrix with $H$ rows and $W$ columns
en.update_explanation: Change the value of row $h$, column $w$ to $v$
